wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Es fixeru sta kubertu pa lisensa [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [[creativecommons:by-sa/3.0/|Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported]].
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: kopia, distribui i transmiti es obra
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Bu ten ki indika ken ke autor, fornesi un iperligason pa lisensa, i mensiona si foi fetu algun alterason. Bu podi fazel di kualker forma razuável, ma sen sujeri ki lisensiador ta apoia bu uzu des obra.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Si bu mistura, transforma o aumenta es kontiudu, bu ten ki distribui bus kontributus ku [[ccorg:share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses|mesmu lisensa o un lisensa konpatível]] ku kel orijinal.
